p: Routine laboratory parameters such as liver transaminases and coagulation parameters were measured in the central laboratory of the University Hospital Essen, Germany, and taken from patient charts. Total immunoglobulin G was measured in serum (Atellica CH930, Siemens, Erlangen, Germany). Virological parameters were measured in the Institute of Virology; HEV IgM and IgG, as well as HEV IgA in a subgroup of patients ( n = 185) according to sera availability, were measured according to the manufacturerÂ´s instructions (Anti-Hepatitis-E-Virus (HEV)-ELISA, Euroimmun AG, Germany).
